      • downloadFile

        public static boolean downloadFile(java.lang.String url,
                                   java.lang.String location)
        Handy static method for downloading and saving files.
        Parameters:
        url - the complete web URL for the file
        location - the complete destination including extension for the file
        Returns:
        true if the file exists in the location, false if an exception is thrown or the file does not exist
